SEARCH
Package ui

Class Main

java.lang.Object
ui.Main
public class Main extends Object
The Main class represents the main entry point for the project management system. It handles the user interface and executes the requested options.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Main()
    Constructs a new instance of the Main class, initializing the scanner and the controller.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    approvedBudges()
    This method prompts the user to enter a project name, and calls the 'approvedBudges' method of the controller, passing the project name as a parameter.
    void
    budgesByType()
    This method prompts the user to enter a project name, and calls the 'createBudgeReport' method of the controller, passing the project name as a parameter.
    void
    culminateStage()
    Method to culminate a project stage.
    void
    executeOption(int option)
    Executes the selected option by the user.
    void
    informationLessonsLearning()
    This method prompts the user to enter a project name and stage name, and calls the 'informationLessonsLearning' method of the controller, passing the corresponding project and stage objects as parameters.
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    The main method that initializes the Main class and executes the user interface loop.
    void
    menu()
    Prints the main menu options for the user to choose from.
    void
    publishedBudge()
    This method prompts the user to enter a project name, and calls the 'publishedBudgesApproved' method of the controller, passing the project name as a parameter.
    void
    registerBudge()
    Method to register a new project budge.
    void
    registerProject()
    Prompts the user to enter the details of a new project and adds it to the system.
    void
    searchCapsulesByKeyword()
    This method prompts the user to enter a project name and a keyword, and calls the 'searchBudges' method of the controller, passing the project name and keyword as parameters.
    void
    searchCollaboratorBudge()
    This method prompts the user to enter a collaborator's name, and calls the 'searchCollaborator' method of the controller, passing the collaborator's name as a parameter.
    void
    searchProjectMoreBudges()
    This method calls the 'projectWithMoreBudges' method of the controller to find the project with the most capsules.
    int
    validateIntegerInput()
    Validates the user input as an integer value.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      public Main()
      Constructs a new instance of the Main class, initializing the scanner and the controller.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method that initializes the Main class and executes the user interface loop.
      Parameters:
      args - An array of command-line arguments for the main method.

    • menu

      public void menu()
      Prints the main menu options for the user to choose from.

    • executeOption

      public void executeOption(int option)
      Executes the selected option by the user.
      Parameters:
      option - The integer representing the selected option.

    • validateIntegerInput

      public int validateIntegerInput()
      Validates the user input as an integer value.
      Returns:
      The integer value entered by the user, or -1 if the input is not valid.

    • registerProject

      public void registerProject()
      Prompts the user to enter the details of a new project and adds it to the system.

    • culminateStage

      public void culminateStage()
      Method to culminate a project stage. It prompts the user to enter the project name, then passes it to the controller to culminate the stage.

    • registerBudge

      public void registerBudge()
      Method to register a new project budge. It prompts the user to enter information about the budge, validates user input, and then passes it to the controller to be added to the current project stage

    • approvedBudges

      public void approvedBudges()
      This method prompts the user to enter a project name, and calls the 'approvedBudges' method of the controller, passing the project name as a parameter.

    • publishedBudge

      public void publishedBudge()
      This method prompts the user to enter a project name, and calls the 'publishedBudgesApproved' method of the controller, passing the project name as a parameter.

    • budgesByType

      public void budgesByType()
      This method prompts the user to enter a project name, and calls the 'createBudgeReport' method of the controller, passing the project name as a parameter.

    • searchCollaboratorBudge

      public void searchCollaboratorBudge()
      This method prompts the user to enter a collaborator's name, and calls the 'searchCollaborator' method of the controller, passing the collaborator's name as a parameter.

    • searchProjectMoreBudges

      public void searchProjectMoreBudges()
      This method calls the 'projectWithMoreBudges' method of the controller to find the project with the most capsules. If a project with capsules is found, the method displays its name, otherwise it prints a message indicating that there are no projects with capsules.

    • informationLessonsLearning

      public void informationLessonsLearning()
      This method prompts the user to enter a project name and stage name, and calls the 'informationLessonsLearning' method of the controller, passing the corresponding project and stage objects as parameters.

    • searchCapsulesByKeyword

      public void searchCapsulesByKeyword()
      This method prompts the user to enter a project name and a keyword, and calls the 'searchBudges' method of the controller, passing the project name and keyword as parameters.
